article_title: Industry payments to doctors show impact of royalties
article_text:
Rochester, MN (55903)

Today

Rain in the morning. Scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High near 75F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Isolated thunderstorms during the evening becoming more widespread overnight. Low 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: Paul John Scott, pscott@postbulletin.com

og.description: Drug and device makers paid American doctors and hospitals $6.5 billion in 2014, according to 2014 figures released Tuesday by the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services.
